physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 46,XY karyotype, normal serum electrolytes, blood urea nitrogen (BUN), glucose levels; age-appropriate levels of random serum LH, FSH, DHEA, D4-A, 17-OHP, and Aldo; high normal F level; elevated plasma ACTH and serum D5-17P; low serum testosterone level compared to reported normal values.
hCG treatment resulted in adequate rises in serum D4-A and testosterone levels. Serum DHEA level was inappropriately elevated compared to reported normal values.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Low normal serum sodium level, upper normal serum potassium level.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Clinical examination showed no signs or symptoms of adrenal insufficiency.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Serum electrolytes and PRA remained normal.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Basal and ACTH-stimulated hormonal findings were similar to levels in infancy, establishing nonsalt-wasting 3bHSD deficiency CAH.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient remained asymptomatic, with normal hormonal function after glucocorticoid and young normal homeostasis without treatment.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Serum electrolytes in normal range; elevated BUN.
Hyponatremia, hyperkalemia, elevated BUN, low glucose levels.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Infant presented with symptoms of lethargy and shock, leading to diagnosis of male pseudohermaphrodite due to severe salt-wasting 3bHSD deficiency CAH.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Condition deteriorated requiring fluid, electrolyte, and hormonal replacement therapy.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: HCG therapy was stopped for 2 days.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Plasma ACTH and serum D5-17P and DHEA levels were exceedingly high; serum 17-OHP and D4-A levels were slightly elevated.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Testosterone levels were low; aldosterone levels were detectable; PRA was at a high normal level.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Hormonal profiles continued to show severe salt-wasting 3bHSD deficiency CAH.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Basal and ACTH-stimulated hormonal profiles revealed similar findings to those at 17 years.
